channel.title: Conceptalbum on Phantisocracy
channel.description: Recent content in Conceptalbum on Phantisocracy

item.title: On ‘Empire Ants’
item.description: From the sublime “Empire Ants”: The falling of the whole empire is here to hold you Rolling out and haunted till it sinks The little Village Green Preservation Society gems on Plastic Beach are snippets of world-building, plastic enough to fit into many different molds and stories.
